name: Second Person Shooter (flipinazip)
description:
GMTK Game Jam Entry

First Person Shooter, but not in the first person.

barely playable, but the basic functionality is there.

At least the sound is decent.

WASD to move camera
mouse to rotate player
LMB to shoot
RMB to move player

i used sfxr as the basis of my sound effects, music by me
